name: Pizza Eater
description:
well

move your mouse, and left click on pizza to grab pizza.

if you run out of pizza, left click on bell to order new pizza.

move your mouse to the head.

you control a hand, you grab pizza, you feed the head.

you order pizza, you grab pizza, you feed the head.

repeat.

i know this game have bug

but im lazy 

One Minute Game jam #6
